actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to permit immediate retirement of certain Federal employees.

summary.text: Provides that a Federal employee is eligible for immediate retirement if such employee is separated from the service while his agency is undergoing a major reduction in force, as determined by the Civil Service Commission, and is serving in such geographic areas as may be designated by the Commission after completing 25 years of service or after becoming fifty years of age and completing 20 years of service.

titles.title: A bill to permit immediate retirement of certain Federal employees.
